[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: Variable(
                BracedVariableVariable(
                    BracedVariableVariable {
                        start: Span(
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        variable: LiteralString {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                9,
                            ),
                            value: "foo",
                        },
                        end: Span(
                            1,
                            14,
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                15,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
